last_episode_to_air.name: Wait, that’s it?!
last_episode_to_air.overview: Back in LA, Jerrold organizes a friendly basketball game for the group, but everyone’s relationships are up in the air when things go left at the afterparty.

name: Sweet Life: Los Angeles
overview: An honest and unique look into what it means to be young, black, and in constant pursuit of one's dreams in the heart of South Los Angeles.

episodes.name: Sweet Life
episodes.overview: After revealing her plans for an upcoming “Black Is Back” event, Tylynn rallies Bri and Amanda to integrate Cheryl – who’s long been coupled up with Jerrold – into their girl gang. Meanwhile, Jerrold and Jordan’s squad, aka The Wood, hassles new member P’Jae about his crush on Bri. While the crew gets ready for a night to remember, can they disentangle the situationship drama looming over the single members of the group?

episodes.name: Good Vibes Only
episodes.overview: Having cleared the air at Black Is Back, Jordan and Bri find themselves growing closer, while Becky and P’Jae’s status remains uncertain. As the crew heads to a luxe estate in Palm Springs to celebrate Amanda’s 25th birthday, will a bad omen and unexpected antics from party guests spoil the good vibes?

episodes.name: You Got Me F**ked Up
episodes.overview: When P’Jae’s showstopping entrance leaves the group divided, Ty and Amanda quickly find themselves fed up. Later, an opulent dinner party promises to reinstate the positive energy – until some uncomfortable confrontations interrupt the good vibes.

episodes.name: A Seat at the Table
episodes.overview: Palm Springs’ messy aftermath finds Jordan confessing his apprehensions about Bri to The Wood, while P’Jae and Becky try to define their relationship. Inspired by the crew’s hustle, Bri considers launching her own business, and later, Ty hosts a “Legacy Table” networking dinner dedicated to her incarcerated father.

episodes.name: Moving In, Moving Out, Moving On
episodes.overview: After opening up about their relationship hang-ups, Jordan’s personal issues come into focus, and Jerrold gets clarity about moving in with Cheryl. Meanwhile, Amanda celebrates purchasing her first home, Bri ventures into new waters, and a game of telephone leaves Ty worried she’s put her boyfriend Jay in a bad spot.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Time in Sexico
episodes.overview: Friendships are tested when Ty brings two different circles together for her 26th birthday in Cabo. Amanda connects with Cheryl, who’s looking to let loose on the trip, while Bri gets her flirt on, and things get awkward between Becky and P’Jae.

episodes.name: No Cabo Cuddles
episodes.overview: The Cabo party gets wild as Cheryl’s alter ego makes an appearance and Ty wrangles Candiss’ over-the-top drama. After Jordan leaves her high and dry yet again, Bri connects with Kam. Later, P’Jae throws Becky for a loop.

episodes.name: Low-Key Privileged
episodes.overview: While planning his upcoming block party, Ty and Amanda hold P’Jae accountable for his actions in Cabo. Jerrold’s podcast creates a safe space for the guys to talk about mental health, but things get heated when the discussion turns to finances and privilege. Later, Bri and Jordan search for romance outside the friend group.

episodes.name: Are We Even Friends?
episodes.overview: At a photoshoot for Cheryl’s fashion line, Ty confronts a defensive Jerrold about his role in the podcast drama. Later, insight from Jordan’s mom prompts him to clear the air with Jay. Though the block party finds P’Jae in his element, the festivities are cut short as simmering conflicts threaten to tear the crew apart.

episodes.name: The Group Chat
episodes.overview: After a welcome from Issa Rae, the cast sits down with Kamie Crawford to bond and look toward the future. But just when the group seems ready to move on, lingering resentments surface — and someone from their past keeps them on their toes.

episodes.name: Ain’t Sh*t Sweet
episodes.overview: The crew is back, bringing all the drama. After P’Jae’s radio interview exposes dysfunction in the friend group, a confrontation at Bri’s body butter launch party leads to further chaos.

episodes.name: The Good, the Bad, and the Medium Ugly
episodes.overview: The fallout of Bri’s party leaves the group fractured. But when Amanda finally comes face-to-face with Ty, will she choose to defend her boyfriend or her best friend?

episodes.name: Tylynn & the Termites
episodes.overview: With tensions still high, Ty tries to rally the girls back together with the promise of a little SoCal-meets-NYC getaway. P’Jae helps Rob land his first comedy gig, while Becky and Myami hash things out.

episodes.name: Accents & Good Times
episodes.overview: The girls head to New York for Ty’s Legacy Table event, but when Myami is left with the worst room at their gorgeous Harlem brownstone, the drama begins before the first night even ends.

episodes.name: Y’all Weird AF
episodes.overview: The girls do their best to put aside drama to pull off a fabulous Legacy Table event. Back in LA, the guys support Rob at his comedy show, but can P’Jae and Jaylenn keep it cordial after their dust up at Bri’s event?

episodes.name: B*tch, What’s the Tea?
episodes.overview: Ty and Jay attempt to address their relationship in therapy, while Amanda tries to repair hers with Rob. Myami convinces Becky to go on a double date, but things get interesting when she’s greeted by an all too familiar face...

episodes.name: Spring BAEcation
episodes.overview: The entire friend group heads to Mexico to focus on rebuilding their friendships and relationships. But when Myami’s best friend Robb stirs the pot, the vacation turns into a complication.

episodes.name: Two B’s, No F*cks
episodes.overview: The friend group’s Mexico vacay continues, as Bri and Becky’s boos join the party. With love, lust, and everything in between floating in the air, the atmosphere may turn old foes back into special friends.

episodes.name: Have You Really Have, Though?
episodes.overview: For their final night in Mexico, Amanda plans a surprise pool party for Rob’s birthday, but the celebration quickly becomes a backdrop to relationship shake ups, make ups, and…break ups.

episodes.name: Wait, that’s it?!
episodes.overview: Back in LA, Jerrold organizes a friendly basketball game for the group, but everyone’s relationships are up in the air when things go left at the afterparty.
